s: Established in London in 1991, Laurence King Publishing is the publisher of books and gifts on the creative arts. We seek to embrace risk, challenge the way our readers view the world, and capture the imagination as we continue to evolve.
Books on art, design, photography, fashion, architecture, crafts, and more.

Laurence King Publishing is a publisher of illustrated books and gifts, from creative how-tos to coffee table books on photography, fashion, art and design to children's books and beautifully packaged gifts and games.

s: Welcome to Laurence King Publishing. Established in London in 1991, Laurence King Publishing is now recognised as one of the world’s leading publishers of books and gifts on the creative arts. Visit our site for a range of books, gifts and activities.

September 7, 2024 - Laurence King Publishing publish over 120 new titles every year for the mainstream adult, children's and gifting markets, on topics including architecture, art, design, fashion, film, photography and popular culture.
